full_summary:
# Office Seating Requirement for DFO Bridgewater, NS

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4294539873
* **Publication Date**: November 6, 2023
* **Solicitation Closing Date**: November 24, 2023, 14:00:00

## Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

## Tender Status

* **Status**: Expired (Note: This information is provided for reference purposes only)

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Method of Procurement**: Selective Tendering (Competitive)
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Nova Scotia
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia

## Project Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating products to DFO Bridgewater, NS. The requirement is for rotary chairs and stools. The contract is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is excluded from international trade agreements.

## Eligibility

Only pre-qualified and Supply Arrangement (SA) holders are eligible to bid. Non-SA holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Contact Person**: Kristelle LeBlanc
* **Contact Email**: [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice and Attachments

The solicitation notice and any attachments can be found on the [Ariba Discovery website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17928911?extsite=MTc5Mjg5MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  

Note: The formatted text contains the rewritten information as per your instructions. The important details have been included in the markdown format. The text has been rewritten in a more professional manner and limited to 400 words. 

Please let me know if any changes are required.

---
